param.name: param.profile
param.spec: text description='Gentoo Profile' label='Profile' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: param.release.type
param.spec: text description='Release Type' label='Type' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: param.target
param.spec: text description='Target Medium' label='Target' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: param.version
param.spec: text description='Version Stamp' label='Version' validationMode='not_empty' display='prompt'

parameters.param:
WORK_DIR="/var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release.type%/%param.subarch%/%param.target%" BUILD_VER="%param.version%" SNAPSHOT="%param.snapshot%" SUB_ARCH="%param.subarch%" REL_TYPE="%param.release.type%" REL_PROFILE="%param.profile%" REL_SNAPSHOT="%param.snapshot%" SRC_PATH="%param.source.path%" TARGET="%param.target%"
[[ -d ${WORK_DIR} ]] || mkdir -p ${WORK_DIR} cd ${WORK_DIR} rm stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc
echo "Fetching hashes" wget -O stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc || exit 1
echo "Checking for templates" [[ -f stage1.spec.header.template && -f stage1.spec.use.template && -f stage1.spec.pkg.template ]] || exit 1
if [[ -f stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(sha512sum stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2|awk '{ print $1 }' ) stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" else [[ -f stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && echo "Clobbering stagnant stage" && rm stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 FETCH_STAGE=1 fi
cd /var/data/catalyst/snapshots/ rm portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum portage-latest.tar.bz2.gpgsig echo "Fetching portage sums" wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum || exit 1 wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.gpgsig || exit 1
if [[ -f portage-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(md5sum portage-latest.tar.bz2) portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" else FETCH_PORTAGE=1 [[ -f portage-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && echo "Clobbering stagnant snapshot" && rm portage-latest.tar.bz2 fi
(( FETCH_PORTAGE == 1 )) && lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2
cd -
(( FETCH_STAGE == 1 )) && lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2 -o stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2
sed -e "s/###SUB_ARCH###/${SUB_ARCH}/" -e "s/###VERSION###/${BUILD_VER}/" -e "s/###REL_TYPE###/${REL_TYPE}/" -e "s/###REL_PROFILE###/${REL_TYPE}\/linux\/${SUB_ARCH}/" -e "s/###REL_SNAPSHOT###/${SNAPSHOT}/" -e "s/###SRC_PATH###/${REL_TYPE}\/stage3-${SUB_ARCH}-${REL_TYPE}-${SNAPSHOT}/" stage1.spec.header.template > stage1.spec echo >> stage1.spec cat stage1.spec.use.template >> stage1.spec echo >> stage1.spec cat stage1.spec.pkg.template >> stage1.spec
sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -s ${SNAPSHOT} sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -f stage1.spec &> catalyst.out &
EMERGE_LOG=$(find /var/data/catalyst/tmp/${REL_TYPE} -name emerge.log &> /dev/null)
while (( $? == 0 )) do [[ -n ${PRINT_STRING} ]] && echo "${PRINT_STRING}" EMERGE_STAT=$(genlop -c -q -i -t -f ${EMERGE_LOG}|egrep -v -e '!!!' -e 'see manpage'|sed 's/$/ /'|tr -d '\n') [[ -n ${EMERGE_STAT} ]] && PRINT_STRING=${EMERGE_STAT} sleep 1 && jobs | grep Running &> /dev/null done
cat catalyst.out

WORK_DIR="/var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release.type%/%param.subarch%/%param.target%" BUILD_VER="%param.version%" SNAPSHOT="%param.snapshot%" SUB_ARCH="%param.subarch%" REL_TYPE="%param.release.type%" REL_PROFILE="%param.profile%" REL_SNAPSHOT="%param.snapshot%" SRC_PATH="%param.source.path%" TARGET="%param.target%"
TEMPLATES="stage2.spec.livecd.template stage2.spec.boot.template stage2.spec.livecd-post.template"
[[ -d ${WORK_DIR} ]] || mkdir -p ${WORK_DIR} cd ${WORK_DIR}
[[ -f stage2.spec.header.template ]] || exit 1
for template in ${TEMPLATES[@]} do [[ -f $template ]] || exit 1 done
echo "Mangling template" sed -e "s/###SUB_ARCH###/${SUB_ARCH}/" -e "s/###VERSION###/${BUILD_VER}/" -e "s/###REL_TYPE###/${REL_TYPE}/" -e "s/###REL_PROFILE###/${REL_TYPE}\/linux\/${SUB_ARCH}/" -e "s/###REL_SNAPSHOT###/${SNAPSHOT}/" -e "s/###SRC_PATH###/${REL_TYPE}\/livecd-stage1-${SUB_ARCH}-${SNAPSHOT}/" stage2.spec.header.template > stage2.spec
echo "Processing template headers" for template in ${TEMPLATES[@]} do echo >> stage2.spec cat $template >> stage2.spec || exit 1 done
echo "Running catalyst scripts" echo sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -f stage2.spec

[[ -d /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% ]] || mkdir -p /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% cd /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2 wget -O portage-latest.tar.bz2 http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2 wget https://gitweb.gentoo.org/proj/releng.git/tree/releases/weekly/specs/amd64/livecd-stage1.spec #sudo catalyst -s "$(date +%Y).$(date +%m).$(date +%d)"
